title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Jasmin Marie Watkins and several juveniles following a teen party disturbance at Playtime USA.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Location: Playtime USA, Hilltop Plaza Shopping Center, Hamilton Avenue, Mount Healthy, Ohio
Suspect: Jasmin Marie Watkins, 33, and seven juveniles
Incident Summary: Officers responded to Playtime USA after management decided to shut down a teen party early due to social media threats of a firearm being brought to the event. As partygoers exited into the parking lot, multiple fights broke out, leading to the arrest of several juveniles and Jasmin Marie Watkins. Watkins was charged with rioting, obstruction of justice, and resisting arrest for allegedly inciting the crowd and threatening an officer. Additional law enforcement agencies were called to assist, and pepper ball guns were noted as available to officers on the scene. Reports also indicated possible gunfire in the area.
I am requesting copies of body-worn camera footage from officers who were present during the response, crowd dispersal, arrests, and any interactions with Jasmin Marie Watkins and the juveniles involved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on July 12, 2018

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Stephanie Clifford, known as Stormy Daniels, at the Sirens Gentlemen’s Club on July 12, 2018.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: July 12, 2018
Location: Sirens Gentlemen’s Club, Columbus, Ohio
Suspect: Stephanie Clifford (Stormy Daniels), 39
Incident Summary: Officers from the Columbus Police Vice Unit arrested Stormy Daniels while she was performing at Sirens Gentlemen’s Club, charging her with three misdemeanor counts of illegally touching a patron. The charges were later dropped, as the law under which she was arrested did not apply to her. Daniels later alleged she was specifically targeted for arrest due to political motivations, and the city of Columbus settled a lawsuit regarding the incident.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who were present during the arrest, transport, booking, and any interactions between officers and the suspect.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of McKenzie Keeling Arrest

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of McKenzie Keeling.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Location: Raising Cane’s, Largo, Florida
Suspect: McKenzie Keeling, age 31
Incident Summary: McKenzie Keeling was arrested after an altercation at Raising Cane’s over missing sauce. She allegedly became verbally and physically hostile, striking a manager and attempting to take the manager’s lanyard with store keys. Witnesses and surveillance footage captured the incident, leading to her arrest for strong-arm robbery.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
